## mapLimit() function

Sames as [map()](./promizr.map.md) but limit the number of iterators that run concurrently.

Note: The resulting array may not be in the same order as the source array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function mapLimit<T, U>(array: T[], limit: number, iterator: AsyncListIterator<T, U>, options?: QueueOptions): Promise<U[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | T\[\] | The array to iterate on |
|  limit | number | The maximum number of iterator to run concurrently |
|  iterator | [AsyncListIterator](./promizr.asynclistiterator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, U&gt; | The iterator that map each item |
|  options | [QueueOptions](./promizr.queueoptions.md) | The options for the inner TaskQueue |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;U\[\]&gt;
